title: The badges under my name
body: I've been looking everywhere and hovering over them doesn't tell me anything. Anybody know what these little badges under my name (as well as others') mean?

replies.body: One is your rank last season so gold.  The one with the people i have no clue.

> [{quoted}](name=fallenreaper88,realm=NA,application-id=6heBIhQc,discussion-id=8W6EpLzP,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-09T12:37:51.685+0000)
>
> One is your rank last season so gold.  The one with the people i have no clue.

Yeah, kinda figured that was my rank last season... the one with the people's always confused me. I don't see many people with it on here.
It's for Refer a Friend from the old days. :)

> [{quoted}](name=Keyru,realm=NA,application-id=6heBIhQc,discussion-id=8W6EpLzP,comment-id=000000000001,timestamp=2017-08-09T18:13:34.331+0000)
>
> It's for Refer a Friend from the old days. :)

I miss those days.....

> [{quoted}](name=Comic Sansler,realm=NA,application-id=6heBIhQc,discussion-id=8W6EpLzP,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-08-09T13:07:11.054+0000)
>

i think it has something to do with the og forums and the trasition to the new ones
